entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:52 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
